Title: A comparison of the organization of the projections of the dorsal lateral geniculate nucleus, the inferior pulvinar and adjacent lateral pulvinar to primary visual cortex (area 17) in the macaque monkey

@Injections.Citation: "...the other receive an injection into the representation of the lower visual quadrant."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "The injection into dorsal striate cortex (lower visual quadrant) produced peroxidase positive cells located medially within the DLG and dorsally within PI and PLa..."

@Injections.Citation: "...received an injection in the representation of the upper visual quadrant.."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "...the ventral injection produced labeled cells located laterally within the DLG and ventrally within PI and PLa."

@Injections.Citation: "...an injection site located rostrally within PI..."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Grains were found in layers IV, III, I of prestriate cortex and layer I of striate cortex."

@Injections.Citation: "... injection site located in the rostral portion of PI."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "... grains were found in layers IV, III and I of prestriate cortex while in striate cortex grains were found in layers  I, II and III..."

@Injections.Citation: "... the injection site was locate more posteriorly and ventrally within PI..."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Grains were found ... in layers IV, III and I of the prestriate cortex... Grains were also found in layers I, II and III of the ventral half of striate cortex..."

@Injections.Citation: "... the injection site was located more caudally and ventrally within PI than in any of the precious case."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "...the grains were found in layers IV, III, and I of ventrolateral prestriate cortex and layer I of striate cortex..."

@Injections.Citation: "Figure 2 illustrates two cases in which the injection site was confined to PLa. In case 5 (Fig. 2A) ...A small portion of the injection spread dorsally to involve a portion of the brachium of the superior colliculus..."
@Injections.Comments: A small amount of this injection spread into the brachium of the superior colliculus.

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Grains were found in layers IV, III, I of dorsolateral and ventrolateral prestriate cortex and clearly in layer I of dorsolateral striate cortex."

@Injections.Citation: "... the injection site confined to the to the ventral portion of PLa..."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Grains were found in layers IV, III, and I of ventral prestriate cortex and layers I, II, III of ventral striate cortex..."

@Injections.Citation: "...an injection site located most dorsally within PLb."
@Injections.Comments: This injection affected the white matter surounding the PLb.

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Grains were found in layer IV, heavily in layer III and in layer I of the parietal cortex (area7)..., no grains were found in the striate or prestriate cortices."

@Injections.Citation: "...injection site was located more ventrally within PLb, yet not invading PLa which lies adjacent to PI."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "The grains in this case were found in the anterior bank of the superior temporal sulcus and the posterior bank and the floor of the intraparietal sulcus (parietal cortex, areas 5 and 7). At this level grains were also found on the medial cortical surface (area 18)."

@Injections.Citation: "...the injection site was located more ventrally within PLb than in the two previous cases."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "...grains were found in a variety of cortical areas. In parietal cortex grains were found in both the banks and floor of the intraparietal sulcus. Within the superior temporal sulcus grains were found in the floor and anterior bank. Grains were also located in the cortex found between the lateral sulcus and the superior temporal sulcus. In addition grains were also found in the cortex on the medial surface of the hemisphere within the parieto-occipital sulcus and area 18. However, no grains were seen in any of the layers of area 17."

@Injections.Citation: "...the injection involved the magnocellular and parvocellular layers of the medial portion of the DLG."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation:
"Grains where found in layer IV within the dorsal and medial regions of striate cortex... No grains were found within any of the supragranular layers of area 17...
No grains where ever seen in area 18 or above layer IV in area 17..."

@Injections.Citation: "...injection into the magnocellular and parvocellular layers of the lateral portion of the DLG."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation:
"...no grains where ever seen in area 18 or above layer IV in area 17...
...grains in layer IV of posteriorventral striate cortex..."

publication.title: A comparison of the organization of the projections of the dorsal lateral geniculate nucleus, the inferior pulvinar and adjacent lateral pulvinar to primary visual cortex (area 17) in the macaque monkey
